resources.string: Click for battery icon display options
Options for status bar battery style
Show battery level for the currently connected BT headset, if available.
If enabled it hides notch and fills in side gaps
Show network activity in the normal status bar
Show network activity in the status bar above quick settings
Color range used on dark status bar
Color range used on light status bar
Charging color used on dark status bar
Charging color used on light status bar
Open quick settings when there are %1$s
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Include seconds in statusbar clock display
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable to display logo in the status bar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Show 4G instead of LTE signal icon
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress view
Show a kill app button in the conversation \'s longpress view
Use same player layout irrespective of orientation
Show the music track title as the QS tile title
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Quick QS tile columns follow QS panel tile column number
Toggle to hide dual-target tile detail indicator after a preset number of columns
Select an image to use for static mode
For better visibility on bright images
Click on any image to use for static mode
Show gradient below status bar in QS panel
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Image to show when no recent apps
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Change the look of the sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen to sleep device
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Display negotiated charger max current-voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Allow accessing power menu on secure lock screen
Disable quick settings tiles on secure lockscreen
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Vibrate on successful fingerprint authentication enabled
Vibrate on successful fingerprint authentication disabled
Add On-The-Go toggle to Power Menu
Add Screenrecord toggle to Power Menu
Add Screenshot toggle to Power Menu
Select compression for screenshot image quality
Add Reboot toggle to Power Menu
Add Advanced Reboot toggle to Power Menu
Add Emergency dialing to Power Menu
When enabled, statusbar will be hidden on lockscreen
Swap volume buttons based on device rotation
Keys control media slider by default. Enable to switch to ring tone slider
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Long press power button for torch
Toggles torch when power button is long pressed while display is off
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
Select custom bootanimation. On every change, the current animation will be backed up to the AICP_backup folder in your internal storage. Old ones must be deleted manually if not needed.
No application found to pick the zip file. Please install a filemanager.
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Modify device hostname used in ip resolution, useful when connecting to this device in a dynamic dhcp environment
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Restore the above set sepolicy mode on each boot
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Be patient for the logs to be created
Customize the look and behaviour of AICP Extras
Launcher icon visibility updated. It might take some time for the change to take effect
Visit our gerrit to know what we are working on
View recent changes made to AICP
Visit the AICP download page for your device
For more functionality, root your device
For all changes to take effect, a SystemUI restart is required. Restart SystemUI now?
Action failed because of missing superuser access
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery.
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Weather is shown below date line with location
Weather is shown on the date line without location

Dedicated weather line is not available for Android S clock or clocks providing their own weather line such as DividedLines clock. For those clocks, toggling this behaves exactly as toggling weather display meaning no weather will be displayed if toggled off.
Condition icon is shown on Lockscreen
Condition icon is hidden on Lockscreen
Notification preview in status bar instead of heads up
Ticker and HeadsUp notifications are mutually exclusive
IMPORTANT: Disabling on-screen navigation disables all on-screen navigation options including gestures!

Navigation bar must and will be automatically disabled!

Available gestures:

Back
- Swipe up on left or right side

Home
- Swipe up center

Recent apps
- Swipe up center and hold

Long press home
- Short swipe up and hold in the center
Use bottom swipe up gestures for navigation\nNavigation bar must be disabled!
Length of the swipe required to trigger gesture
Minimum height from bottom to start triggering gesture
Timeout before the gesture action is started
Toggle to enable, click for options
Various options only applicable in 2- or 3-button navigation mode
Toggle to enable onscreen navigation bar
Customize the layout of the navigation bar
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Places navigation bar on left side of screen in landscape mode
Unable to load image from content provider
A unique and fully customizable gesture-based navigation bar
Back and Home must always be set. To change Back or Home assignments, set the desired assignment first.\n\nEnabling double-tap actions produces a slight delay with single-tap responsiveness.
Setting actions to only right/left will split touch areas amongst entire bar.
Threshold tuning is based on width/height percentage of Fling interface area
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Adjust the time threshold for executing long-press actions
Double-tap left/right actions become left/right keyboard cursor actions when keyboard is visible
Are you sure you want to reset Fling to stock settings?
Navigation bar pulse display.\nPulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer. Click for options.
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Each bar is animated more smoothly
Apps to be skipped for Pulse
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Create other pulse and flip vertically

Long-pressing any button brings up edit menu. A short hold on any button initiates a drag and drop button sorting option.\n\nEnabling double-tap actions produces a slight delay to single-tap responsiveness.
Set the position of contextual buttons (menu, ime selector, etc.)
Set animation style of primary buttons when pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Choose which buttons to display with on-screen keyboard and while music playing
Allow swiping on navigation bar to enable one-handed mode
Double-tap on empty navbar areas to sleep
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
Network mode will be switched to 3G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen off
Number of seconds to wait before performing actions after screen on
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
Enable to show active music track info in Ambient display

Ambient Music Ticker shows playing music track info within Ambient display screen.

It's triggered also if Ambient Display is disabled when a new track is started, forcing a clean ambient screen with track info in the middle of the screen.

You can also tap on track info to skip track.

If you own a Pixel and enable Now Playing and its notification in system Audio settings, Ambient Music Ticker will also work within it.
Off to supress/on to enable to play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Enable to use volume keys for cursor control
Wake your device up by pressing the volume keys
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on the screen\'s brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Left edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
This is test for selected toast animation
Tap here to add to the list, tap on the listed app to remove
Apps blocked from showing headsup notifications.
Blacklist: tap Add app to add, tap on app name listed to remove
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps selected for app circle bar
Apps selected to be shown on App Circle Bar
Tap here to add, tap on the listed app to remove\nMessages, Camera, PlayStore and Settings are shown as defaults
Enable to show the configured trigger region for app circle bar launcher
By default, preferences that will probably not work well on your device (because of e.g. root status or display cutout) will not be shown
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Play the notification sound of each app only once per set time period
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Shut off pixels to reduce power consumption
Enable Smart Pixels when battery saver is enabled
Prevents burn-in on OLED devices by shifting pixels every so often
Enable for volume keys to answer call
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Gradually change colors between full and empty
Color range used when blending colors
Display the cross next to statusbar when data is disabled
Toggle on to show Running Services icon
Toggle on to show Settings icon
Toogle on to show Edit icon
Toogle on to show MultiUser icon
Toogle on to show power menu
Enable to show AOD when charging
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Location where the Pie will be placed
Move volume panel from right to left side
Soft reboot is in progress, please be patient
Set night mode for apps based on the selected theme
Activate one-handed mode. Swipe left or right on stock navbar to toggle, use SmartBar actions for toggling.
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Allow legacy apps to use full screen
Applications need to be restarted after changes
Show the estimated battery life in QS panel
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Show heads up only for dialer, alarm clock and messaging app
Control the blur amount of media artwork
Toggle to enable setting max notifications count on lockscreen
Control the maximum number of expanded notifications to show on lockscreen
Toogle to show custom text on qs footer
Please enter a new text. Leave blank to revert to stock.
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
Pulse flash when there\'s a call waiting
Whether to flash when in Do Not Disturb mode
Set partial screenshot as default action for Screenshot button in power menu. Otherwise a long press action triggers it.
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing
Display notification when changing alert slider position
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Uses adjusted primary wallpaper color for FOD icon\nNOTE: might look good only with some wallpapers
Use accent default color for icon
Use accent default color for FOD icon
Shows animation while reading your finger
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing back button
Show media heads up when a new track is played, if the player is not already in foreground
Block ads with a modified hosts file. Turn off to use third party solutions or if apps cause issues.
Headset only if music is active
Enable to use a bottom-centered button instead of stock Clear All text
Customize gestures and set custom actions
To choose a specific app activity for the action, long press on any app in the apps picker.\n\nIf launcher is showing, do the swipe at the very bottom area of the screen to trigger the action.
Trigger action if the swipe is horizontally wider than 3\/4 of display size
Enable for percentage, disable for time estimate.
Show headers in the notification shade
Enable to number of notifications on notification icons
Disable to revoke package signature spoofing for all apps.

Signature spoofing allows an app to pretend to be a different app. Malicious applications might be able to use this to access private application data (however this would only be possible if you granted that permission to the app!). Legitimate uses include emulators such as MicroG etc.
Enable to switch to mobile icon style with raised connection type indicator
Turns on from sunset to sunrise
Turns on based on a custom schedule
Turns on between sunset and given time
Turns on between given time and sunrise
Choose apps to block sensors for
Block access to various sensors for selected apps.
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Toggle to use Android 12 style searchbar in Settings app. Settings app needs to be manually restarted for the change to take effect.
Control which status bar icons are shown
Enables blurs in some UI elements; requires device reboot
Lock screen Blur cannot be enabled because your current lock screen wallpaper does not match your home screen one, or your device does not support Blur at all.
Show app volume in volume panel
Fingerprint sensor wakes and unlocks the phone when enabled (default). Turn off for power button fingerprint readers.
Disable black fill-in for display cutout
Extra features for immersive gaming experience
Disable auto brightness when entering game mode
Display the notification content in the form of danmaku in the game
Choose the application that you want to launch with a floating ball
Show menu overlay when game is running. If this option is disabled, some game mode features will be disabled, such as Danmaku notifications
Show current FPS information, if supported
Adjust performance level when starting game
Do not allow floating notification and conversation bubbles other than incoming calls and alarms
Turn off the ringing of incoming calls and notifications in gaming mode
Answer calls automatically in the game and hands free when no headphones connected
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Automatically filter notifications such as download progress
Select what to show when you press the power button
Enable to show a small clock on lockscreen.
Enable for vertical layout. Default is horizontal
Use custom color for monet engine instead of wallpaper colors
Enable to show ripple animation on lockscreen authorization.
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings

Show a brightness slider in the quick qs panel
Select VoLTE icon to display on statusbar
Choose VoWiFi icon to display on statusbar
Show separate indicator when an any app uses mic or camera
Show separate indicator when an any app uses location
Use proper app icons for notification icons in statusbar
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
